package.name: Lotus Dark Settings VPN Icon
package.shortDescription: VPN Icon for Preferences app for Lotus Dark

descriptionlist.description: In my addition to Lotus Dark I added preferencess app icons but I didn't know I didn't cover VPN at the time. This package adds the icon for VPN.
No screenshots for this item. No options to configure. Toggle the theme in Anemone / Snowboard

changelog.change: Marked this package as safe for rootless jailbreak
